WeavingStrategy 
     public class
     
      InliningWeavingStrategy
extends Object
implements WeavingStrategy

A weaving strategy implementing a weaving scheme based on statical compilation, and no reflection.

Author:
Jonas BonŽr , Alexandre Vasseur
